I designed a special Chipset, which improves the efficiency of machines.
Useable is this Chipset above all in Energy generators, where it controls the generation and transformation of energy. This increse the production per tick or the profit from resources.
A industrial chipset of high quality (high chippower) and the usage of multiple chipsets, increase accordingly the effect.
Hint: The exact effect is noted by the supported machines.
Hint: Refer "Logic Chipset" for general informations.
